Stranger Things 5

Season 5 is the final chapter of the show and continues directly after the events of Season 4. The story centers on the full-scale invasion of the Upside Down into Hawkins, with Vecna as the main threat. The season is expected to be darker, more intense, and emotionally heavy, as all the main characters come together for one last fight. It aims to answer long-standing mysteries of the Upside Down while delivering a powerful and emotional farewell to the characters and the story.
